Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jarvis. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Jarvis.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
